avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches released in the area 28-30 January.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New unstable wind slabs can form in snowfall and snowdrift especially in N to NE slopes. Wet avalanches may release with thaw on Wednesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snowpack melted last week. The remaining show is stable. Snowfall and snowdrift on Monday, Tuesday and Thursday may form wind slabs on top of the stable snow especially in N-NE slopes. Another thaw is forecasted on Wednesday, and then wet avalanches become likely.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvöss S-SV áttum með rigningu, slyddu og snjókomu. Hlýnar og rigning á miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Several avalanches fell in the area last week, and while temperatures were rising on Friday 31 January.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New unstable wind slabs can form in snowfall and snowdrift especially in N to NE slopes. Wet avalanches may release with thaw on Wednesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snowpack melted last week. The remaining snow is stable. Snowfall and snowdrift on Monday, Tuesday and Thursday can likely form new unstable wind slabs on top of the stable snow especially in N-NE slopes. Another thaw is forecasted on Wednesday, and then wet avalanches become likely.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvöss S-SV áttum með rigningu, slyddu og snjókomu. Hlýnar og rigning á miðvikudag í lálendis.

avalancheActivity.comment: A wet slab in Burstabrekkudalur on Friday and some wet-loose on Saturday
avalancheActivity.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to thawing and strong winds on Friday and Saturday.  Wind slabs may form in SW-winds the next days

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm and strong winds on Friday and Saturday. Temperatures have reached close to 10°C at mountain elevations, and the snowpack is expected to have become isothermal most places an rather stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-stormur með snjókomu til fjalla en bloti í byggð, dregur úr vindi aðfaranótt þriðjud. en áfram éljagangur í SV-átt

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet avalanches released in the mountains during the rapid melting on Friday and Saturday. Slush flows released onto roads in southern East fjords.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm temperatures and rain on Friday and Saturday. Thin wind slabs may form in SW-winds until

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm temperatures and rain on Friday and Saturday and again on Sunday-Monday. After strong melting the snow pack is expected to be isothermal and stable. Thin wind slabs may form during SW-winds until Wednesday

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow melted rapidly during the weekend and became isothermal and stable most places. Today it has been snowing in W-NW winds in N-Westfjords

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-átt með éljum fram á miðvikudag
